CustomField.formula: IF( LEN( Name ) = 0, 0,1) + IF( LEN( BillingStreet ) = 0, 0,1) + IF( LEN( BillingCity ) = 0, 0,1) + IF( LEN( BillingState ) = 0, 0,1) + IF( LEN( BillingPostalCode ) = 0, 0,1) + IF( ISPICKVAL(Industry,""), 0,1) + IF( LEN( Sic ) = 0, 0,1) + IF( NumberOfEmployees = 0, 0,1) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Frequency__c ,""), 0,1) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Current_Prior_Method__c ,""), 0,1) + IF( ISPICKVAL( HRIS_Current_Prior_Method__c ,""), 0,1) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Time_Labor_Current_Prior_Method__c ,""), 0,1) + IF( LEN( CPA_Name_Ref__c ) = 0, 0,1) + IF( LEN( Banker_Name_Ref__c ) = 0, 0,1) + IF( LEN( Broker_Name_Ref__c ) = 0, 0,1) + IF( LEN( H_B_Carrier__c ) = 0, 0,1)
CustomField.label: Data Quality Score
